messages.ssml: <speak>The World Health Organization urges everyone to use masks wisely.  Only wear a mask if you are feeling sick and have <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> symptoms (especially coughing) or looking after someone who may have <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub>.</speak>

<speak>The World Health Organization urges everyone to use masks wisely.  Only wear a mask if you are feeling sick and have <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> symptoms (especially coughing) or looking after someone who may have <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub>.</speak>
messages.displayText: The World Health Organization urges everyone to use masks wisely.  Only wear a mask if you are feeling sick and have COVID-19 symptoms (especially coughing) or looking after someone who may have COVID-19.

messages.title: WHO Advice on When to use masks
messages.formattedText: Watch this video to learn about using masks rationally

messages.destinationName: What is the correct way to wear and dispose of masks?

messages.speech: The Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends that you cover your mouth and nose with a cloth when you go out. Children under age 2 and people who have trouble breathing or might not be able to take off their own mask shouldn't wear one. Don't wear a mask intended for health care workers and always continue to keep at least 6 feet away from other people, even when wearing a mask.
